WowApp is the next generation network allowing members to earn money and share it with the world by doing good and donating to charities. We are looking for several remote Java Backend Developers with strong functional programming skills and end-to-end product development experience, who will be building revolutionary sharing platform which gives a possibility to earn from daily activities to millions of our users worldwide and handles thousands of requests per minute.
These individuals will get a chance to play the key role in developing a highly-distributed product based on cutting edge technologies such as Kafka, Cassandra, ElasticSearch and Spark, taking deep dive into functional programming with Java 8 and even Scala.

По твоим знаниям JDK можно писать методичку под названием «Как надо, чтобы было хорошо и чтобы за это потом никому ничего не было».

Откликаясь на эту вакансию, ты автоматически соглашаешься с тем, что ты круто шаришь многопоточность, можешь достаточно бегло говорить по английски и хочешь попасть в крутую команду инженеров с MIT бэкграундом.

Когда за окном идет дождь, ты хмуришь брови и придумываешь решение, которое улучшает performance на твоем проекте, и тебе не чужды слова metrics и instrumentation.

Ты будешь участвовать в разработке модуля, отвечающего за real-time bidding, и в твои обязанности будет входить улучшение и дополнение функционала, а также увеличение масштабируемости системы.

Team Values
Our technological boundaries mostly centered around Java as the core intermediate component which release platform functionality via web applications. UI part itself is OK to experiment with modern frameworks and approaches. To name a few, our last applications have been built with Angular 1.5 and React with Redux.
We value autonomy in application design decisions, as well as deep involvement into product creation so that it fits customers best. Developers in our team are able to take certain control under how, when and what features are to be delivered.
We respect working software over documentation, and believe into a sustainable increase of software value over time while new features being added. Thus our aim is to keep the code clean and well tested, and to design applications being self-verifying for correctness in automated way. We use no QAs. Developers are the key testers on our projects, as well as delivery managers and live applications support operations.

A total of 500,000 homes and business are currently connected to Get’s fibre-based network, and more than 1 million private and business customers use our services on a daily basis. More and more people want to connect to our fibre network, and we were the company in Norway with the strongest growth in both broadband and TV in 2013.
Get is among the European companies in the industry with the strongest growth, and from year 2000 we have had a double-digit percentage annual growth.

item.title: Full Stack - Intern в TransferWise, Черкассы
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

— A massive computer nerd (like us) — with hands-on experience or recent graduate
— Kick ass at or at least passionate about full-stack modern web development (JVM and JS experience helps)
— Have built cool stuff which you can explain to your grandma
— When the DB goes nuts and your code goes sideways you keep your wits and find a solution while still being able to have fun
— Want to pursue your Engineering dream, challenge yourself again complex tech puzzles and to have an actual impact on millions of people

Будет плюсом

— Understanding of Scrum and Agile development
— Experience using database abstraction layers like Hibernate.
— Be a customer of TransferWise

Предлагаем

People in TransferWise are some of the smartest and nicest people you’ll meet. There’s people here from over 50 nationalities, from companies like Google, AirBnB and Paypal. Expect to learn more here than any book can ever teach.

And what do we offer? Apart from the all-expenses-paid company trips, stock options in one of Europe’s most hotly tipped startups, a laptop and team lunches every day, you won’t get much in the way of extras. However, we will give you 25 days holiday a year (plus public holidays), a fun, friendly atmosphere, plenty of opportunities to grow and the chance to be part of our little revolution. Oh, and coffee, there’s plenty of coffee.

Обязанности

Here at TransferWise we don’t hire coders, who pick up tickets from a backlog and push code to production.

We hire engineers that empathise with our customers problems, develop solutions and measure results. We’re proud of engineering team — it’s built an incredible product that’s changing the world. They operate autonomously within their teams, focussing relentlessly on our customers.

О проекте

TransferWise was founded in 2011 with a clear mission: Money without borders — so people and businesses can send and receive any currency effortlessly, whenever, wherever.

Sure, the heart of what we do is international money transfer. And we’re committed to making it instant, convenient and fair for millions of people, all over the world. But we’re growing our other products and our teams at an exciting pace. And we’re looking for the very best to jump on board.

How do we work?
At TransferWise, we do things a bit differently. There’s no corporate nonsense and no old-fashioned hierarchy. Instead, we work in dozens of self-sufficient, autonomous teams. Think of them like start-ups within a start-up that learn from each other.

We’re going to be upfront — the way we work doesn’t suit everyone. But if freedom, autonomy, and life-affirming, head-scratching professional challenges rock your world, we could be a match made in heaven.

Each team picks the problems they want to solve. So there’s no micro-management. No hiding behind fancy job titles. And no one telling you what to do. You are your own boss...

Which means that as an Engineering Intern, you will be fully responsible for finding problems and creating products that solve those problems and help a lot of people in a very meaningful way. But you’ll get of course, tons of guidance and plenty of support along the way from talented, super-smart colleagues from all over TransferWise.

Did someone say benefits?

Обязанности

You love optimization and self-learning new algorithms and you feel right at home in a fast-growing international development team.

TransferWise is the clever new way to move money between countries. Co-founded by Skype’s first employee and backed by some of planet’s most experienced innovators, including Sir Richard Branson and PayPal founder Peter Thiel, we’re disrupting the world of currency & international money transfer. That means flipping a gazillion dollar industry on its head and taking power away from banks and the establishment.

We’re currently 350 people strong and handling more millions in customers’ money every day.

TransferWise is a 100% boredom-free zone. If you’re looking for a stuffy financial company, the back button beckons, if you want to be part of something innovative and truly exciting, read on.

item.title: Senior Rest API Engineer в TransferWise, Таллинн (Эстония)
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

— You are passionate about technology, its relationship with business, and customer experience.
— You understand that super simple API interface has to hide a lot of internal complexity from users
— You have experience in building public Rest APIs and backend systems, preferably using Java 8
— You get satisfaction from getting your hands dirty and making a difference to customers.
— You are humble and work well in a team with very different people

Предлагаем

Apart from the all-expenses-paid company trips, stock options in one of Europe’s most hotly tipped startups, a laptop and team lunches every other Thursday, you won’t get much in the way of extras. However, we will give you 28 days holiday a year (plus public holidays), a fun, friendly atmosphere, plenty of opportunities to grow and the chance to be part of our little revolution. Oh, and coffee, there’s plenty of coffee.

Not from Estonia? — No stress, we will help you (and your family) to relocate from any part of the world!

Обязанности

Open up TransferWise payment platform by building public APIs for companies, marketplaces, banks and everyone else who wants to build their own product on top of our payment services.

In the last 5 years we have built global payment network and amazing consumer product that helps to save money for half a million people each month. We have now realised that to truly accomplish our mission we need to open up our payment platform via public APIs so others can integrate and build on top of our platform.

We need your help figuring it all out. We feel that our beta API interface (api-docs.transferwise.com) is too complicated, has performance challenges and consistency issues. Reliable sandbox and self-service are waiting to be built. If you have created order from chaos before, made complicated things simple, figured out what are the most important blockers for customers then we need to talk.

Our Tech

At its core, our stack is Java microservices, using Netflix OSS offerings, and SPAs written in Angular 1/React, with a legacy Grails monolith. We are moving quickly to proven distributed technologies that can be scaled (Kafka, Zookeeper, Eureka, Bouncer + much more)

More details: tech.transferwise.com/…​of-our-little-revolution

О проекте

TransferWise was founded in 2011 with a clear mission: Money without borders — so people and businesses can send and receive any currency effortlessly, whenever, wherever.

Sure, the heart of what we do is international money transfer. And we’re committed to making it instant, convenient and fair for millions of people, all over the world. But we’re growing our other products and our teams at an exciting pace. And we’re looking for the very best to jump on board.

Our Values

We value you, your opinion and your skills. We really do. In fact we trust you so much that it will be entirely up to you and your team only to figure out what needs to be done to address the challenge. There is no hierarchy to go to for getting your plans approved. No managers taking glory for your achievements.
Customers first. Here at TransferWise we don’t hire coders, who pick up tickets from a backlog and push code to production without considering value and impact to our customers.
We get things done. If you have already accomplished great things which stand out from the average then you will feel right at home in Transferwise.
Find out more: tech.transferwise.com/…​-principles-transferwise

— Develop and integrate components for the natural language processing tasks
— Work in the development team, which is collectively responsible for the overall health, performance and capacity of the services
— Be hands-on with network architecture, load balancing, CI/CD, provisioning and security of the production and staging environments. Continuously fine-tune deployments, monitoring and other routines.
— Participate in a call duty for the second-tier escalations as part of a global team

О проекте

Built by linguists and language lovers, Grammarly’s writing app finds and corrects hundreds of complex writing errors — so you don’t have to. Millions of users worldwide trust Grammarly’s free and premium products, which are also licensed by more than 600 leading universities and corporations. Grammarly is an Inc. 500 company with offices in San Francisco and Kyiv.

As a Delivery Manager, you will formulate and execute project plans, and manage cross-functional project teams across multiply geographies, solution practices and business domains. We are seeking a self-motivated, pro-active individual, comfortable working in fast paced environment and able to drive a project from concept to delivery.
